Candidate :  Cuong Phan   
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:   Vietnam  
 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
BSc. Chemistry Major  University of Natural Sciences, HCMC, Vietnam 2000 - 2004  
 
 
CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
Sep 2021 to da te Evonik, Smart Material  
Position : Silica Business Manager, V ietnam  
• Sales management for Silica business in Vietnam (€ 9.0 M).  
• Plan and execute business strategies to grow sales volume and margin target for Vietnam 
market.  
• Manage sales operation include: pricing, contract negotiation, demand forecast, receivables, 
deliveri es, product complains.  
• Build and maintain relationship with key accounts, distributor, at all levels .  
• Provide market and competition insights, ensure Evonik competitive advantages.  
 
Feb 2021 – Aug 2021 : Honeywell, Honey

CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
Sep 2021 to da te Evonik, Smart Material  
Position : Silica Business Manager, V ietnam  
• Sales management for Silica business in Vietnam (€ 9.0 M).  
• Plan and execute business strategies to grow sales volume and margin target for Vietnam 
market.  
• Manage sales operation include: pricing, contract negotiation, demand forecast, receivables,

• Build and maintain relationship with key accounts, distributor, at all levels .  
• Provide market and competition insights, ensure Evonik competitive advantages.  
 
Feb 2021 – Aug 2021 : Honeywell, Honeywell Process Solution  
Position:  Business Development Manager/Sr. Account Manager, Vietnam.  
• Delivered an nual financial targets, which contrib ute to divisional profit and growth objectives 
(USD 8.0 M).  
• Manage multiple pursuits across many accounts tailoring solutions and developing business to 
achieve the financial revenue.  
• Linked sales with marketing and technologies to share customer needs  into the NPI process.  
• Provided competitive insight and trends in support of sales pursuits.  
• Created and execute on a comprehensive enterprise solution s sales plans.  
• Accurately planned and forecasted orders. Consistently identified new business opp ortunities 
for sustained profitable growth.  
• Grew and maintained a quality opportunity funnel adequate to meet financial targets. Leveraged 
all available reso urces to grow the business.  
• Generated lead, opportunities in new vertical industries including Pharmaceuticals, 
Renewables, Energy Storage Battery.  
 
Jan 2016 – Aug 2020: Honeywell UOP, Lifecycle Solution Technologies  
Position: Regional Sales Manager for V ietnam, Philippines and Myanmar.  
 • Exceeded/delivered annual sales targets for UOP’s Catalysts, Adsorben ts, Equipment & 
Services, Digital offerings to customers in Vietnam, Philippines and Myanmar (USD 15.0 - 20.0 
M) 
• Received Honeywell Global Gold Bravo Awa rd (2019), Silver Bravo Award (2017, 2020), 
Bronze Bravo (2016, 2019).  
• Managed sales and pricing strategies in liaison with Product Marketing teams.  
• Managed tenders/bids for UOP’s offerings.  
• Managed contract preparation, finalization negotiations in liai son with Business and Legal team.  
• Managed sales revenue forecasts,  product demand planning, receivables.  
• Developed accounts planning, service plans.  
• Maintained, developed relationships with customers, from different levels (Engineers to C -
levels)  
• Coord inated with other businesses for one Honeywell approach.  
• Pursu ed new projects (early engagement with investors, consultants, EPCs), new applications, 
take away projects.  
• Appointed and developed new agents, distributors fo r untapped area, applications.  
• Managed and supported Sales Distributors in APAC (exclude China and India, 2016 -2018) for 
UOP s industrial wastewater application.  
 
Mar 2010 – Dec 2015: General Electric, Power & Water , GE Water & Process Technologies,  
Position: Vietnam Sales Manager  
• Delive red/Exceeded Vietnam annual sales target for GE Chemical Monitoring Solutions (USD 
3.0 M).  
• Conducted pricing strategies, deal review with regional commercial team.  
• Conducted Accounts planning.  Coached team members for tech nical and commercial 
developmen ts.  
• Worked with regional team for new large -scale projects for early approaches, engagements.  
• Set up site operations, recruited and trained new service engineers dedicated for specific 
accounts.  
• Initiated and conducted operation cost saving.  
• Appointed a nd managed distributors/sales channel partners to achieve the sales targets.  
• Generated/reviewed technical and commercial proposals.  
• Led Vietnam team to deliver 100 % Services Standard to customers.  
• Conducted and de livered 100 % Value Generating Projects for key accounts.  
• Conducted safety, technical training to key customers.  
• Assigned and supported team members for completing required EHS,

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
